panels.description: Average node memory allocated in AnonPages  (user space memory) as reported through /proc/meminfo.
panels.title: Avg node memory allocated

panels.description: Memory breakdown of the web component in GB

targets.expr: (avg((ruby_process_proportional_memory_bytes{environment="gprd", stage="main", type="web"}) - (ruby_process_unique_memory_bytes{environment="gprd", stage="main", type="web"})) * count(avg(ruby_process_proportional_memory_bytes{environment="gprd", stage="main", type="web"}) by (pid))) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024

panels.title: Web memory breakdown (all, GB)

panels.description: Memory breakdown of estimated physical memory use of the web component in percent. Physical means accounting for shared memory between processes.
panels.title: Web memory breakdown (real, %)

panels.description: Memory breakdown of the api component in GB

targets.expr: (avg((ruby_process_proportional_memory_bytes{environment="gprd", stage="main", type="api"}) - (ruby_process_unique_memory_bytes{environment="gprd", stage="main", type="api"})) * count(avg(ruby_process_proportional_memory_bytes{environment="gprd", stage="main", type="api"}) by (pid))) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024

panels.title: API memory breakdown (all, GB)

panels.description: Memory breakdown of estimated physical memory use of the api component in percent. Physical means accounting for shared memory between processes.
panels.title: API memory breakdown (real, %)

panels.description: Memory breakdown of the sidekiq component in GB

targets.expr: (avg((ruby_process_proportional_memory_bytes{environment="gprd", stage="main", type="sidekiq"}) - (ruby_process_unique_memory_bytes{environment="gprd", stage="main", type="sidekiq"})) * count(avg(ruby_process_proportional_memory_bytes{environment="gprd", stage="main", type="sidekiq"}) by (pid))) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024

panels.title: Sidekiq memory breakdown (all, GB)

panels.description: Memory breakdown of estimated physical memory use of the sidekiq component in percent. Physical means accounting for shared memory between processes.
panels.title: Sidekiq memory breakdown (real, %)

panels.description: The total_allocated_objects count as reported by `GC.stat`, as a per-second-rate over a 1 hour sample set, averaged over all application processes.
panels.title: Object allocations/sec

panels.description: Average number of slow queries across a moving 1 hour window per minute and across the entire DB cluster.
panels.title: Global slow queries (>1s) per minute

panels.description: API endpoints that take 2 seconds or more in the 95th
panels.title: Slow API endpoints

panels.title: Slow API endpoints (list)
